examples: He took the rookie pitcher under his wing.
A new wing was added to the building.
Who's playing on the wing?
Friends shared a platter of crispy chicken wings with tangy dipping sauces at the sports bar.
She dusts the chicken wings with cornflour before frying them.
words.defineEn: any of the two parts of the body of a bird, insect, etc. used for flying
words.defineVi: bất kỳ hai bộ phận nào trên cơ thể của chim, côn trùng, v.v. được sử dụng để bay

examples: I need to search the web for information about that topic.
She is planning to take a course in web design.
Your web browser has strong encryption in it.
You can watch their conversation our Web site.
I was actually just browsing the web
words.defineEn: a membrane that connects the toes of certain aquatic birds, such as ducks and coots, enabling them to swim with greater ease
words.defineVi: một màng nối các ngón chân của một số loài chim sống dưới nước, chẳng hạn như vịt và chim cuốc, giúp chúng bơi lội dễ dàng hơn

examples: Every part of their look is equally important when it comes to grading, from symmetrical wattles and earlobes to uniformly covered shiny black feathers.
You're also gonna wanna fill up their wattle bottle whenever it gets less than half full.
words.defineEn: a colorful and usually red lobe that hangs from the head or neck of a bird
words.defineVi: một thùy màu đỏ sặc sỡ và thường treo trên đầu hoặc cổ của một con chim

examples: Jack vented his spleen at his wife whenever things went badly at work.
Peter vented his spleen on his car by kicking it when it broke down.
I listened patiently while she vented her spleen.
Jack was struggling and found comfort in venting his problems to his brother Joe, looking for sympathy and validation.
Mom's been venting her spleen to me for an hour already.
words.defineEn: the rectum or external opening in some animals, such as a fish, bird, etc., through which waste is passed
words.defineVi: trực tràng hoặc lỗ mở bên ngoài ở một số động vật, chẳng hạn như cá, chim, v.v., qua đó chất thải đi qua

examples: An eagle’s needle-like talons can pierce the skulls of their prey.
And once on the ground, the slashing of the Eagle’s talons did the rest.
You got a baby with the sharp talons as well?
but then sometimes he has the Wolverine talons.
She managed to grab the Sampo in her claw, but just as quickly, it dropped into the sea, shattering into pieces and sinking deep beyond her talon’s reach.
words.defineEn: a long, sharp nail on the foot of some birds, especially birds of prey
words.defineVi: một cái móng dài và sắc nhọn trên chân của một số loài chim, đặc biệt là chim săn mồi

examples: When it comes to training a new employee, it's important to remember that you should never spur a willing horse, as they are already motivated to learn and pushing them too hard may cause them to burn out.
Its success spurred demand for all types of fish.
This mystery about asymptomatic COVID-19 has spurred a ton of research into the inner workings of our immune system.
But I hung up my spurs after beer cans and marbles.
And they also spurred street actions that occasionally became violent.
words.defineEn: a pointed extension of bone that grows from the leg or foot and is used for defense, mating rituals, or establishing dominance within a social group
words.defineVi: một phần mở rộng nhọn của xương mọc ra từ chân hoặc bàn chân và được sử dụng để phòng thủ, nghi lễ giao phối hoặc thiết lập sự thống trị trong một nhóm xã hội

words.defineEn: the outermost part of a bird's wing that includes the primary feathers and contributes to the bird's flight maneuverability and stability
words.defineVi: phần ngoài cùng của cánh chim bao gồm các lông chính và góp phần vào khả năng bay ổn định và linh hoạt của chim

examples: The ruff has two different types of feathers.
This is ruff.
Living ruffed lemurs specialize in eating fruit.
Owls also have something called facial ruffs, which help to amplify the sound and give them superpower hearing abilities.
Other accounts have him rocking an Elizabethan ruff and lace frills at his wrists.
words.defineEn: a decorative and frilled collar-like structure made of feathers or hair that encircles the neck of a bird
words.defineVi: một cấu trúc giống như cổ áo trang trí và diềm làm bằng lông vũ hoặc lông bao quanh cổ của một con chim

examples: Their mandibles are shears that cut through leaves with incredible efficiency.
With sharp mandibles, it cuts a circular door in the seed wall.
The black ant’s mandibles are serrated for grinding up food.
I'm looking for the back of his mandible.
The earliest fossil from our genus, a partial mandible, or lower jaw, from Ledi-Geraru in Ethiopia, is dated to 2.8 to 2.75 million years ago, in the Pliocene Epoch.
words.defineEn: the lower or upper part of a bird's beak
words.defineVi: phần dưới hoặc trên của mỏ chim

examples: Many plant-eating birds intentionally swallow small stones, which then sit in a special section of their digestive tract called the gizzard.
And fossils also revealed that birds started to have fewer teeth after they developed gizzards.
Gizzards are a muscular part of the stomach where, with the help of swallowed pebbles, birds can grind up their food.
So with the advent of gizzards at least 120 million years ago, the need for teeth started to fade.
They swallow it whole and leave the work to their gizzard: a thickly walled portion of the stomach that grinds up food.
words.defineEn: the muscular part of a bird's digestive system with thick walls that grinds the food for a better digestion
words.defineVi: phần cơ bắp của hệ thống tiêu hóa của chim với những bức tường dày giúp nghiền thức ăn để tiêu hóa tốt hơn

examples: They are riding the crest of the wave at the moment.
The company is on the crest of the wave following the successful launch of their new product line.
They’ve been on the crest of the wave ever since their election victory.
After winning the Nobel Prize, Dr. Lee is on the crest of the wave in his field of study.
We seem to have been riding on the crest of a wave since the election.
words.defineEn: a prominent feature exhibited by some birds on their heads, consisting of feathers, fur, or skin
words.defineVi: một đặc điểm nổi bật được thể hiện bởi một số loài chim trên đầu của chúng, bao gồm lông, lông hoặc da

examples: He carefully combed his hair before going out.
The police went over the house with a fine-tooth comb.
She used a small brush to comb her eyebrows into shape.
I looked everywhere with a fine-toothed comb but can't find my purse.
I usually stand in front of the mirror to comb my hair.
words.defineEn: a fleshy, often brightly colored, crest located on top of the head of certain bird species
words.defineVi: một mào thịt, thường có màu sắc rực rỡ, nằm trên đỉnh đầu của một số loài chim

examples: Turn a collar down.
A collar that turns down.
He turned up the collar of his coat.
Some of you were getting very hot under the collar about Royals.
She'd got him by the collar.
words.defineEn: a distinct ring, band, or marking around the neck or throat area of an animal
words.defineVi: một vòng, dải hoặc đánh dấu riêng biệt quanh vùng cổ hoặc cổ họng của động vật

words.defineEn: a fleshy, comb-like growth on top of the head of certain domestic roosters and other bird species
words.defineVi: một khối thịt, giống như chiếc lược mọc trên đỉnh đầu của một số con gà trống nhà và các loài chim khác

examples: She prefers boneless turkey breast for its ease of slicing.
He grilled a juicy chicken breast for his dinner.
The chicken breast supreme salad featured grilled chicken, mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, and a balsamic vinaigrette.
She made turkey breast wraps, filling tortillas with sliced turkey, cucumber, and a creamy ranch dressing.
My grandmother shared her recipe for succulent roast chicken breast, passed down through generations.
words.defineEn: the front part of a bird's or a mammal's body
words.defineVi: phần phía trước của cơ thể của một con chim hoặc động vật có vú

examples: My father pays his bills at the beginning of the month.
Come on, Bill.
The bill has the President's seal of approval.
The bill was four votes shy of a majority.
His parents footed the bill for his college education.
words.defineEn: a hard curved jaw of a bird, especially a wide or slender one
words.defineVi: một hàm cong cứng của một con chim, đặc biệt là rộng hoặc mảnh mai

examples: The bird had bright feathers and a long beak.
But this creature also had a beak.
They also had toothless beaks.
Here, its broad beak gives us a major lifestyle clue.
What lineage gave rise to these weird reptiles with beaks for mouths and retractable necks?
words.defineEn: the hard or pointed part of a bird's mouth
words.defineVi: phần cứng hoặc nhọn của miệng chim

examples: He collected wishbones from different birds and displayed them as a unique collection.
They made a wish and pulled apart the wishbone, hoping for good luck.
What does the wishbone do?
That’s right, just like your Thanksgiving turkey, dinos from T. rex to Archaeopteryx had wishbones.
VO: Fossil wishbones are one of the most important pieces of evidence we have that birds descended from Theropod dinosaurs.
words.defineEn: a Y-shaped bone between the neck and breast of a bird
words.defineVi: một xương hình chữ Y giữa cổ và ngực của một con chim

examples: The lion's sharp teeth and claws are used for hunting.
and I will claw thee, so you better watch your back.
The politician maintained a pleasant facade but his opponents knew that cats hide their claws, so they remained wary of his true motives and ambitions.
In negotiations, a clever hawk hides its claws, which is why it's important to be strategic and hold back some of your bargaining chips until the right moment.
They say that in this town, it's claw me
words.defineEn: a sharp and curved nail on the toe of an animal or a bird
words.defineVi: một cái móng sắc và cong trên ngón chân của một con vật hoặc một con chim

examples: Her constant criticism really makes my hackles rise!
Their arrogant attitude is what really made my hackles rise.
He's not baring his teeth, he's not growling, he doesn't have any hackles up, he's just very calm.
words.defineEn: the long erectile feather or hair in the neck area of some birds and mammals such as dogs
words.defineVi: lông hoặc lông mọc dài ở vùng cổ của một số loài chim và động vật có vú như chó

examples: The fertile soil in this region yields abundant crops of wheat and corn.
The farmer harvested a bountiful crop of watermelons from his fields.
The study analyzed the yield of various crops across different regions, providing valuable insights for agricultural planning.
The land is used to grow crops.
More land was needed to grow crops for export.
words.defineEn: a pouch in a bird's throat that is used for storing and digesting food
words.defineVi: một túi trong cổ họng của một con chim được sử dụng để lưu trữ và tiêu hóa thức ăn

examples: And mantle upwellings drive volcanic activity.
After the crust, comes the mantle.
The upper mantle has different regions, too.
The lower mantle reaches deep down to the outer core of Earth.
Families often displayed these pictures proudly on walls and mantles.
words.defineEn: the region of feathers covering the upper back, shoulders, and base of the wings
words.defineVi: vùng lông bao phủ lưng trên, vai và gốc cánh

words.defineEn: a type of small, fluffy feather that covers the base of a bird's larger flight feathers, providing insulation and helping to streamline the bird's wing shape
words.defineVi: một loại lông nhỏ, mịn bao phủ phần gốc của lông bay lớn hơn của chim, giúp cách nhiệt và giúp sắp xếp hợp lý hình dạng cánh của chim

words.defineEn: any of the larger wing or tail feathers of a bird
words.defineVi: bất kỳ cánh lớn hơn hoặc lông đuôi của một con chim

words.defineEn: the feathers on the underside of a bird's wing, which can have distinctive patterns and colors that are often visible in flight
words.defineVi: những chiếc lông ở mặt dưới của cánh chim, có thể có hoa văn và màu sắc đặc biệt thường thấy trong chuyến bay

words.defineEn: the small feathers on a bird's wing that cover the larger feathers and help the bird fly better
words.defineVi: những chiếc lông nhỏ trên cánh của một con chim bao phủ những chiếc lông lớn hơn và giúp con chim bay tốt hơn

examples: Covert oil deliveries are crucial to North Korea’s economy and its ballistic and nuclear weapons program.
You know what I wanna use instead, the ginkgo covert switch dock.
As it reels in the catch, the cone snail uses another covert tool called a rostrum.
Is it for jacking into the main frame during your covert ops or using it while taking enemy fire?

That's where what was a classic intelligence or espionage operation, gathering information about a foreign adversary, something all countries do, became a covert operation, what in Russian intelligence circles is called an active measure, an attempt to actually influence the outcome of a political event in a foreign country.
words.defineEn: a small feather that covers the base of a bigger feather on the wings or tail, helping the bird to fly better by keeping it warm and streamlined
words.defineVi: một chiếc lông nhỏ bao phủ phần gốc của chiếc lông lớn hơn ở cánh hoặc đuôi, giúp chim bay tốt hơn bằng cách giữ ấm và thuôn dài

words.defineEn: a feather on the wing that helps with stability and maneuverability during flight. It's located between the flight feathers and the bird's body
words.defineVi: một chiếc lông trên cánh giúp ổn định và khả năng cơ động trong chuyến bay. Nó nằm giữa lông bay và cơ thể của con chim

examples: The five candidates spent almost the entire debate ahead of the primaries trading punches.
The Red Cross's primary concern is to preserve and protect human life.
English is the primary language spoken in the United States.
Euglena serves as a primary producer, contributing to the food chain in aquatic ecosystems.
Tax reform was one of the new president's primary campaign promises, but it will likely prove a hard row to hoe, given the deep divisions in congress.
words.defineEn: one of the main flight feathers projecting along the outer edge of a bird's wing
words.defineVi: một trong những chiếc lông bay chính nhô ra dọc theo mép ngoài của cánh chim

words.defineEn: the lower part of the leg, located between the shank and the foot, providing support and flexibility for perching and walking
words.defineVi: phần dưới của chân, nằm giữa cẳng chân và bàn chân, cung cấp sự hỗ trợ và tính linh hoạt cho việc đứng và đi lại

words.defineEn: a line of color that goes across or behind the eye of a bird, making the bird's eye and facial features more noticeable
words.defineVi: một đường màu đi qua hoặc phía sau mắt của một con chim, làm cho mắt và các đặc điểm trên khuôn mặt của con chim dễ nhận thấy hơn

words.defineEn: a glandular organ found in the digestive system of birds that functions in the initial breakdown of food before it enters the stomach
words.defineVi: một cơ quan tuyến được tìm thấy trong hệ thống tiêu hóa của các loài chim có chức năng phân hủy thức ăn ban đầu trước khi nó đi vào dạ dày
